column4: hi, does any1 know how i can get the creation-date of a file with the command "find" ? i want to cp a file from a specific date into a directory
you cannot, theres no such info on ext-fs (yet)
the find example from http://www.cyberciti.biz/faq/linux-unix-osxfind-files-by-date/  might help
ok, that helps, but how can i cp the found files into a directory?
{}  if you have filenames with spaces
erm... it says find: missing argument for -exec
but i want to have the rights alrdy when i start up the computer
chmod/chown it to your needs   once, it will be persistent
